summary: Frontend testing completed for 3 key features: 1) Empirical Antibiotics page under Children > Approaches - PASS, 2) Marquee animation on Drugs page with long drug names on mobile - PASS, 3) Growth Chart PDF export with background chart image - PASS. All features are working as expected.

tests: Empirical Antibiotics option exists in Approaches dropdown
Search for 'antibiotics' filters and shows the approach
Page displays comprehensive antibiotic guidelines content

Sections visible: Introduction & Key Principles, Antimicrobial Resistance Alert, Main Concerns Regarding Abx Use, Essential General Rules, Important Note on Febrile Neutropenia, Skin & Soft Tissue Infections
Marquee animation class 'animate-marquee' found in DOM
Animation triggers when drug card is expanded on mobile viewport (375x667)
Long drug names like 'Trimethoprim-Sulfamethoxazole' show scrolling text animation
Duplicate text pattern visible (confirming continuous scroll implementation)
drugs_page_marquee_animation.implementation_details: Uses CSS animation with duplicate text pattern for seamless scrolling

tests: Growth chart displays with background SVG image
Measurement points can be added to chart
PDF export triggered successfully when Save button clicked
Chart shows Weight-for-age BOYS with WHO Child Growth Standards percentile lines
growth_chart_pdf_export.implementation_details: Uses jsPDF with SVG-to-Blob conversion for chart background rendering

critical_code_review_comments: EmpiricalAntibioticsApproach.jsx properly imported and exported in approaches/index.js
Marquee animation correctly implements duplicate text pattern for continuous scrolling (lines 598-618 in DrugsPage.jsx)
PDF export uses Blob URL conversion for SVG files (lines 315-331 in GrowthChartPage.jsx)
Tailwind config includes marquee keyframes animation (lines 70-82)
seed_data_creation: Test measurement added to Growth Chart (6 months, 8kg)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 new features verified: 1) Empirical Antibiotics page accessible via Children > Approaches, 2) Marquee animation works on mobile when expanding drug cards with long names (>20 chars), 3) Growth Chart PDF export includes background chart image using Blob URL for SVG conversion.

pdf_export.svg_handling: Fetch SVG, convert to Blob URL, load as Image, draw on canvas
